title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 9 - Conditions of probation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 9 - Conditions of probation

State Regulations

Sec. 410.10 C.P.L. FORM 9

Sec. 65.10 P.L. (Conditions of

Probation)
5/85
ADVISEMENT TO DEFENDANT
YOUR FAILURE TO CONFORM TO ANY OF THE
FOLLOWING CONDITIONS OF YOUR PROBATION, INCLUDING THE FAILURE TO REPORT TO YOUR
PROBATION OFFICER, IS A VIOLATION OF PROBATION. YOU HAVE A RIGHT TO BE PRESENT AT ANY HEARING
TO DETERMINE WHETHER A VIOLATION OF PROBATION HAS OCCURRED. IF YOU
INTENTIONALLY ABSENT YOURSELF FROM THE COURT'S JURISDICTION OR INTENTIONALLY
FAIL TO APPEAR AT A VIOLATION OF PROBATION HEARING, A HEARING MAY BE HELD IN
YOUR ABSENCE AND A REVOCATION OF YOUR PROBATION MAY RESULT. ________ COURT OF ________
COUNTY OF ________
________ x
PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, Ind./Docket No. ________
- against -
CONDITIONS OF PROBATION
________, Defendant. ________ x
THE ABOVE-NAMED DEFENDANT HAVING BEEN
________ convicted of the crime of
____________
________ found to be a youthful offender for
the criminal act of ____________
____________
in the criminal action entitled above, and having been sentenced to: ________ a ________ term of imprisonment, and
to
________ a ________ year period of probation
to expire on ________, unless terminated sooner in accordance with the Criminal

Procedure Law
________ and to pay a fine in the amount of $
________, it is
ORDERED that during the period of probation
the defendant shall comply with the following conditions and any other
conditions which the Court may impose at any time prior to the expiration of
the period of probation: PROBATION CONDITIONS:-THE PROBATIONER
SHALL: 1. Report to a probation officer as directed
by the Court or the probation officer and permit the probation officer to visit
his or her place of abode or elsewhere. A) Report immediately to ____________
B) Upon release from custody report
immediately to ____________
____________
2. Remain within the jurisdiction of the Court
unless granted permission to leave by the Court or the probation
officer. 3. Answer all reasonable inquiries by the
probation officer and notify the probation officer prior to any change in
address or employment. ________ 4. Refrain from violating any
federal, state or local law; notify the probation officer if arrested or
questioned by any law enforcement official. ________ 5. Avoid injurious or vicious
habits. ________ 6. Refrain from frequenting unlawful
or disreputable places. ________ 7. Refrain from consorting with
disreputable persons. ________ 8. Work faithfully at a suitable
employment or pursue a course of study or vocational training that can lead to
suitable employment. ________ 9. Support his or her dependents and
meet other family responsibilities. ________10. Undergo available medical or
psychiatric treatment and remain in a specified institution when required for
that purpose or directed by the Court or probation officer. ________11. Participate in an alcohol or
substance abuse program approved by the Court. ________12. Make restitution or reparation in
the amount of $ ________, for the benefit of

Name of Victim, at a rate of $________ per
____
Time Frame, to be paid in full by

Date Prior to Expiration of Sentence. Pay such restitution or reparation together
with a designated surcharge of $________, to
____________
Name of Restitution Agency
________13. Perform services for a public or
not-for-profit corporation, association, institution or agency, as
follows: ____________
____________
________14. Spend a specified part of this
sentence at a division for youth facility or attend a nonresidential program
pursuant to P.L. ยง65.10(2)(i), as follows: ____________
____________
________15. Post a bond or security in the
amount of $ ________ for the performance of any or all conditions
imposed. ________16. Observe the specified conditions
of conduct as set forth in an order of protection issued pursuant to CPL
ยง530.12. ________17. Comply with the following
conditions which the court deems to be reasonably related to his or her
rehabilitation: ____________
____________
________18. Obey the directions given by the
probation officer to insure compliance with the Conditions of Probation. E N T E R
Dated: ________, New York
________, 19________
______________
Justice/Judge
RECEIPT
I have this day received a copy of the
foregoing Conditions of Probation. ______
Dated: ______________
Defendant (Signature)
______________
Witness (Court Clerk) (Signature)

Sec. 410.10 C.P.L. Forma 9

Sec. 65.10 P.L. (Condiciones de

Probatoria)
5/85
NOTIFICACION AL ACUSADO
SU INCUMPLIMIENTO CON CUALQUIERA DE LAS
SIGUIENTES CONDICIONES DE SU PROBATORIA, INCLUYENDO EL NO REPORTAR A SU OFICIAL
DE PROBATORIA, ES UNA VIOLACION DE PROBATORIA. USTED TIENE EL DERECHO DO ESTAR PRESENTE EN
CUALQUIER VISTA PARA DETERMINAR SI HA OCURRIDO UNA VIOLACION DE PROBATORIA. SI
USTED INTENCIONALMENTE SE AUSENTA DE LA JURISDICCION DE LA CORTE O
INTENCIONALMENTE FALLA DE COMPARECER EN UNA VISTA DE VIOLACION DE PROBATORIA, UNA VISTA EN SU AUSENCIA SE PUEDE LLEVAR ACABO LO CUAL PUEDE RESULTAR EN
REVOCAR SU PROBATORIA. ________ CORTE DE ________
CONDADO DE ________
________ x
CIUDADANOS DEL ESTADO DE NUEVA YORK, - contra - Causa/Registro No. ________
CONDICIONES DE
________, PROBATORIA
Acusado. ________ x
EL MAS-ARRIBA MENCIONADO ACUSADO HABIENSO
SIDO
________ convicto del crimen de
____________
________ habiendo sido encontrado como
delincuente juvenil por el acto, criminal de ________ en la accion criminal mas
arriba citada, y habiendo sido sentenciado a: ________ a ________ termino de encarcelacion, y a
________ a ________ ano() periodo de
probatoria que expirara en ________ a no ser que sea terminada antes de su
expiracion, de acuerdo con la Ley del Codigo Penal
________ y de pagar una multa en la cantidad
de $ ________
asi se
ORDENA que durante el periodo de Probatoria el
acusado debera cumplir con las siguientes condiciones y cualquiera otras
condiciones que la Corte pueda imponer en cualquier tiempo antes de que expire
el periodo de probatoria: CONDICIONES DE PROBATORIA:-LA PERSONA EN
PROBATORIA DEBERA: 1. Reportar a un oficial de probatoria, como
asi ordenado por la Corte o el oficial de probatoria, y permitir al oficial de
probatoria el visitar su lugar de residencia o cualquier otro lugar. A) Reportar inmediatamente a
____________
B) Al ser puesto en libertad reportar
inmediatamente a ____________
____________
2. Permanecer dentro de la jurisdiccion de la

Corte a no ser que la Corte o el oficial de probatoria le haya dado permiso a
ausentarse. 3. Contestar razonablemente todas las
preguntas del oficial de probatoria y notificar al oficial de probatoria antes
de que se efectue cualquier cambio de direccion o empleo. 4. Refrenarse de violar cualquier ley federal, estatal o local; notificar al oficial de probatoria si usted es arrestado
nuevamente o interrogado por cualquier agente de la ley. 5. Evitar habitos nocivos o viciosos. 6. Refrenarse de visitar lugares ilegales o de
dudosa moralidad. 7. Refrenarse de tratar a personas de mala
reputacion. 8. Trabajar puntualmente en un empleo
apropiado o seguir un curso de estudios o entrenamiento vocacional que pueda
conducir a un empleo adecuado. 9. Mantener financieramente a sus dependientes
y hacerse cargo de otras responsabilidades familiares. 10. Someterse a tratamiento medico o
siquiatrico disponible y permanecer en una institucion especifica, cuando es
requerido para ese proposito, o ordenado por la Corte o el oficial de
probatoria. 11. Participar en un programa de
rehabilitacion alcoholica o de drogas aprobado por la Corte. 12. Indemnizar o compensar en la cantidad de $
________ para el beneficio de
(I) [FN3] ( ____________ and I jointly and
severally) undertake that defendant will appear in
de $________ por
(I) [FN3] ( ____________ and I jointly and
severally) undertake that defendant will appear in
(I) [FN3] ( ____________ and I jointly and
severally) undertake that defendant will appear in
indemnizacion o compensacion, junto con un
sobrecargo designado de $____________, a
_________________
(Nombre de la Agencia de Compensacion)
13. Prestar sus servicios, sin remuneracion, a
una corporacion sinfines-lucrativos, agencia publica, asociacion o institucion, como sigue:____________
14. Pasar una parte especifica de esta
sentencia en una facilidad de la Division Juvenil o atender un programa
no-residencial de acuerdo al P.L. ยง65.10(2)(i), como sigue: ____________
15. Fijar un deposito o fianza en la cantidad
de $ ________ para asegurar la ejecucion de cualquiera o todas las condiciones
impuestas. 16. Observar las condiciones especificas de
conducta puestas en vigencia por una orden de proteccion emitida de acuerdo a
la LCP ยง530.12. 17. Cumplir con las siguientes condiciones que
la Corte estime razonablemente relacionadas con su rehabilitacion: ____________
18. Obedecer las direcciones dadas por el
oficial de probatoria para asegurar el total cumplimiento de las Condiciones de

Probatoria. ENTRADA
Fechado: ________, Nueva York
________, 19 ________
xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
______________
Magistrado/Juez*
RECIBO
Yo, en este dia, he recibido una copia de las
mas arriba mencionadas Condiciones de Probatoria. xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
____________
Fechado: ______________
Acusado (Firma)*
xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
______________
Testigo (Escribano de la Corte)
(Firma)*
THIS FORM IS FOR INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY; ONLY THE OFFICIAL ENGLISH VERSION OF THE FORM SHOULD BE SIGNED. ESTA FORMA EN ESPANOL ES SOLAMENTE PARA SU
CONOCIMIENTO; SOLAMENTE LA VERSION EN INGLES REQUERIRA SU
FIRMA. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form
9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
